shorttext: These vegan cannabis oil capsules from liiv have 1:1 ratio of THC to CBD and very mild THC potency.
title: 1:1 Capsules (5 mg THC, 5 mg CBD per cap)
description: The oil in liiv’s vegan cannabis oil capsules is extracted using CO2 extraction technology. The greenhouse-grown hybrid strain used in the oil has a myrcene, beta-caryophyllene, linalool, humulene and limonene terpene mix, and it’s combined with grape seed oil and modified palm kernel oil to deliver a consistent 1:1 THC to CBD ratio. It’s available in 15-capsule bottles and has very mild THC potency.
